repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: U.S. Commission on Industrial Relations on Microfilm
did.abstract: Microfilm copy of the reports in the Library of the Wisconsin State Historical Society and the Shelf list of the Reports of the Commission.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Commission on Industrial Relations was a commission created by the U.S. Congress on August 23, 1912. The commission studied work conditions throughout the industrial United States between 1913 and 1915.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Microfilm copy of the reports in the Library of the Wisconsin State Historical Society and the Shelf list of the Reports of the Commission.
Reports of the Commission and reports of investigations made for the Commission.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: U.S. Commission on Industrial Relations on Microfilm #5398 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
